title: 10 Commandments Of Ranked LoL
body:
Thou shall not Troll
Thou shall not rage at thy Noob
Thou shall not go Afk or Leavith
Thou shall not Test New Builds or Champs
Thou shall not Blame others for thy OWN lane losing.
Thou shall Wards for thy Win
Thou shall Help Secure Dragons for thee greater good.
Thou shall realise Team work wins over thy individual skill.
Thou shall join in on team fights
Thou shall use ping effectively for Mia's, Dangers, and Assists

replies.body: Just like the real 10 commandments they were ignored, I don't care if you board addicts troll me. this is probably the most important post since season 1. If people listen to this post this game would actually be enjoyable again

> [{quoted}](name=Demon Incarnate,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Zeb1xoHb,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-17T05:58:50.805+0000)
>
> this is probably the most important post since season 1.

Holy %%%%, everyone, drop what you're doing! This guy has the most important post made since this game's inception.

Oh wait, nobody actually cares what you're saying and calling us trolls isn't going to help.

Also, here's one commandment you forgot: Thou shalt remember to git gud.
HAHAHA drop what you are doing.... sounds abit harsh

Firstly *boards. Secondly the OCE forums/boards have always been a joke but so has the OCE server. Nothing new there. Thirdly, the post I linked was more important than this sh!t, which just goes to show how important this sh!t is.
I'm not a religious person, soz.

> [{quoted}](name=Demon Incarnate,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Zeb1xoHb,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2014-12-17T08:53:20.574+0000)

Actually I can. I don't need to repost sh!t for people to comment on it or even read it, unlike certain people in this thread (demon incarnate).
Do me a favour, Stay the %%%% out of my posts. You dont like me, I certainly dont like you. So just %%%% off and leave me and my posts alone.

Firstly, it's not that I don't like you, I'm actually neutral towards you. Secondly, if you don't want me posting in your threads don't post. These boards are public so you have to expect randoms jumping on and posting. As long as I stay within the rules you can't stop me from posting. I said a few ever so slightly hurtful things (exaggerated to make you feel better), so what? Build a bridge and get over it.

Bro, you think leavers are good. and if you think this is a "bad post" your exactly the type of person to do those thing. If you had any love for the game you would be saying "yes that's awesome, everyone should follow these" but instead you nay say them... which means ur one of "them". Its as simple as that
